rows.text: km (mi) Bonn's urban rail system is made up of two components: a six line, km (mi) Stadtbahn network inaugurated from an upgraded Straßenbahn system in 1975, and a legacy Straßenbahn network of three lines and km (mi) of route which can be dated back to 1891.
